families.name: LS2000

options.name: Material
options.notes: S=316SS, H=Halar, U=UHMWPE, T=Teflon, TS=Teflon Sleeve. H and TS have $110/ft adder, U $40/inch, T $50/inch.

options.name: Voltage
options.notes: 12VDC and 240VAC not available for LS2000. 24VDC is no extra charge.

options.name: Length
options.rules: Standard is 10". For S, add $45/foot over 10". For H or TS, add $110/foot over 10". For U, add $40/inch over 4". For T, add $50/inch over 4". $300 adder for non-standard lengths (except TS). Halar max 72". For longer, use TS.

options.name: Mounting
options.notes: See Level Switch Option Prices for flange/tri-clamp adders.

options.name: Extra Static Protection
options.notes: Recommended for plastic pellets or resins with static charges.

compatibility_rules: Halar max length is 72" (6 feet). For longer, use Teflon Sleeve.
$300 adder for non-standard lengths (except TS).
12VDC and 240VAC not available for LS2000.
notes: Other baked on coatings available (food grade PFA Teflon, Ryton) - consult factory.
See Level Switch Option Prices for flange/tri-clamp adders and exotic metals.
S=316SS, H=Halar, U=UHMWPE, T=Teflon, TS=Teflon Sleeve.

families.name: LS2100

options.name: Material
options.notes: S=316SS, H=Halar, T=Teflon, TS=Teflon Sleeve, U=UHMWPE. H and TS have $110/ft adder, T $50/inch, U $40/inch.

options.name: Length
options.rules: Standard is 10". For S, add $45/foot over 10". For H or TS, add $110/foot over 10". For T, add $50/inch over 4". For U, add $40/inch over 4". $300 adder for non-standard lengths (except TS). Halar max 72". For longer, use TS.

options.name: Mounting
options.notes: See Level Switch Option Prices for flange/tri-clamp adders.

compatibility_rules: Halar max length is 72" (6 feet). For longer, use Teflon Sleeve.
$300 adder for non-standard lengths (except TS).
notes: 24VDC units work on 16 to 32 VDC.
Other baked on coatings available (food grade PFA Teflon, Ryton) - consult factory.

families.name: LS6000

options.name: Material
options.notes: S=316SS, H=Halar, TS=Teflon Sleeve, CPVC=CPVC Blind End. H and TS have $110/ft adder, CPVC $400 + $50/inch over 4".

options.name: Length
options.rules: Standard is 10". For S, add $45/foot over 10". For H or TS, add $110/foot over 10". For CPVC, add $50/inch over 4". $300 adder for non-standard lengths (except TS). Halar max 72". For longer, use TS.

compatibility_rules: Delrin insulators are standard for SS probes. Teflon insulators are standard for Halar and Teflon Sleeve probes as well as other baked coatings.
Max Temperatures: Delrin insulator 250F; Teflon insulator 450F; PEEK insulator 550F.
Do not use Delrin in applications with STEAM.
3/4" NPT process connection is optional at no extra charge (max 300 psi @ 75F).
Halar max length is 72" (6 feet). For longer, use Teflon Sleeve.
$300 adder for non-standard lengths (except TS).
notes: Other baked on coatings available (food grade PFA Teflon, Ryton) - consult factory.
Cable probes and special materials of construction available.

families.name: LS7000

options.name: Material
options.notes: S=316SS, H=Halar, TS=Teflon Sleeve, CPVC=CPVC Blind End. H and TS have $110/ft adder, CPVC $400 + $50/inch over 4".

options.name: Length
options.rules: Standard is 10". For S, add $45/foot over 10". For H or TS, add $110/foot over 10". For CPVC, add $50/inch over 4". $300 adder for non-standard lengths (except TS). Halar max 72". For longer, use TS.

compatibility_rules: Halar max length is 72" (6 feet). For longer, use Teflon Sleeve.
$300 adder for non-standard lengths (except TS).
3/4" NPT process connection is optional at no extra charge (max 300 psi @ 75F).
notes: Other baked on coatings available (food grade PFA Teflon, Ryton) - consult factory.
Cable probes and special materials of construction available.
On board timer often used to pump down sumps or avoid nuisance alarms due to splashing.

families.name: LS7000/2

options.name: Material
options.notes: H=Halar, TS=Teflon Sleeve. H and TS have $110/ft adder.

options.name: Length
options.rules: Standard is 10". For H or TS, add $110/foot over 10". $300 adder for non-standard lengths (except TS). Halar max 72". For longer, use TS.

compatibility_rules: Halar max length is 72" (6 feet). For longer, use Teflon Sleeve.
$300 adder for non-standard lengths (except TS).
U and T materials are not available for dual point switches.
LS7000/2 is designed for auto fill/empty only (one relay).
notes: Other baked on coatings available (food grade PFA Teflon, Ryton) - consult factory.
For critical filling, use a separate independent high level switch for positive shut off.

families.name: LS8000

options.name: Material
options.notes: S=316SS, H=Halar, TS=Teflon Sleeve. H and TS have $110/ft adder.

options.name: Length
options.rules: Standard is 10". For S, add $45/foot over 10". For H or TS, add $110/foot over 10". $300 adder for non-standard lengths (except TS). Halar max 72". For longer, use TS.

options.name: Process Connection
options.notes: 1" NPT and big housing for high vibration available at no extra charge.

compatibility_rules: Halar max length is 72" (6 feet). For longer, use Teflon Sleeve.
$300 adder for non-standard lengths (except TS).
notes: Other baked on coatings available (food grade PFA Teflon, Ryton) - consult factory.
Cable probes and special materials of construction available.
Receiver is normally sold without an enclosure.

families.name: LS8000/2

options.name: Material
options.notes: H=Halar, TS=Teflon Sleeve. H and TS have $110/ft adder.

options.name: Length
options.rules: Standard is 10". For H or TS, add $110/foot over 10". $300 adder for non-standard lengths (except TS). Halar max 72". For longer, use TS.

compatibility_rules: Halar max length is 72" (6 feet). For longer, use Teflon Sleeve.
$300 adder for non-standard lengths (except TS).
U and T materials are not available for dual point switches.
For multiple set points on one probe, fluid must be grounded to mounting nipple.
notes: Other baked on coatings available (food grade PFA Teflon, Ryton) - consult factory.
For critical applications, use a separate independent high level switch for emergency shut-down.

families.name: LT9000

options.name: Material
options.notes: H=Halar, TS=Teflon Sleeve. H and TS have $110/ft adder.

options.name: Length
options.rules: Standard is 10". For H or TS, add $110/foot over 10". $300 adder for non-standard lengths (except TS). Halar max 72". For longer, use TS.

compatibility_rules: Halar max length is 72" (6 feet). For longer, use Teflon Sleeve.
$300 adder for non-standard lengths (except TS).
notes: Other baked on coatings available (food grade PFA Teflon, Ryton) - consult factory.
For high temperatures or harsh acids, check with factory for epoxy compatibility.

families.name: FS10000

options.name: Length
options.rules: Standard is 6". For S, add $45/foot over 6". Max probe length recommended is 24".

compatibility_rules: Max probe length recommended is 24".
1.5", 3", and 6" probes are the same price.
notes: For detecting emissions before visible, recommend air velocities >2000 ft/min.
See application notes for velocity calculation.

families.name: Presence/Absence Switches
compatibility_rules: Standard flanges are 316SS Flat Face Flanges.
For other flange sizes, consult factory.
notes: LS7500 replaces Princo L3515, LS8500 replaces L3545.
See website for more information and downloadable PDF.
